page.title: 03OUR SCHOOL
page.content:
We have two buildings, the main one and in the playground a small one. Inside the main school there are three classrooms and a hall.There are four teachers in the school.The headmaster is called Mr Pickering.Mrs Clayton teaches the middle class.Mrs Henderson
teaches the infants and Mrs Charity a part-time teacher teaches the top class on a Monday afternoon.She takes the older girls for games.Mr Pickering takes the boys for games.Sometimes they play cricket.In the Autumn they play football.The girls play rounders, netball or football. On Wednesday Mrs Clayton takes the top class for art.While we do art Mr Pickering takes Mrs Clayton's class for history.19 people have school dinners but 40 of us bring packed lunch. Pamela Clark.
